name: Futuristic pizza delivery
description:
This futuristic bike pizza driving simulator is designed for people who love to play the role of pizza delivery boy. We can assure you that 3D futuristic pizza delivery games were never seen such before. This is a modern futuristic pizza delivery bike driving simulator game in which our delivery man is to drive the Bike and deliver the pizza. So get ready to enjoy the pizza and order to our pizza shop the pizza man is Collect hot tasty pizza from the pizza shop and take them to other delivery point to deliver the pizza at different areas in the city within the given time to the clients. If the pizza delivery boy fail to reach the location within the given time then the level failed.
Many different sites of the city are under construction so the roads are jumpy and that’s why the pizza boy is failed to deliver the pizza in time.
This pizza delivery bike is designed for people who love to play the role of pizza delivery boy. We can assure you that this pizza delivery boy games were never such before. Futuristic Pizza boy duty is very tough and challenging job! Now play this 3D futuristic pizza delivery boy simulation and experience the crazy stunt biker skills of a fast food delivery guy.

This game is a futuristic pizza delivery bike driving simulator in which our role is to drive the futuristic pizza bike and deliver pizzas by controlling pizza boy. You have to go around the city looking for different destinations by following a map. Ride the motorcycle through the city like a pro biker, take some sharp turns in city traffic jammed streets and reach the destination in time. If you like driving games or parking games, this game is right up your street. Plus, you get to drive around the city freely. So Time to experience this amazing pizza delivery boy which gives you the excitement of delivering pizza’s to different locations on time. So take your pizza delivery boy and get ready to deliver pizzas.

GAME PLAY:

- Choose a Futuristic bike
- Right pedal to accelerate and Left pedal for brake.
- Tilt right and left or choose button to left or right accordingly to avoid spoiling the pizza.
- Sell all your pizzas in the shortest amount of time.
- Complete mission in time to achieve next Level.
Those who want to unlock and ride on new bikes, complete more levels to achieve
New bikes.

Features:

- Drive 3 cool custom designed Futuristic pizza rider motorcycle
- Challenging missions to test your driving skills
- Rush through crazy traffic with extreme fun and challenges
- Stunning sounds to enhance your gaming experience
- 3d HD Graphics.
- Reach at target on time.
- Easy and smooth game play.
- Splendid 3D animation

Time to play Futuristic pizza delivery games and experience this amazing pizza bike simulator which gives you the excitement of delivering pizza’s to different locations on time. Take your 3D pizza delivery boy and get ready to deliver pizzas.
